products.title: Hygge Birds Nordic Blue Roller Blind
products.description: So fresh and good-natured, the hygge birds nordic blue roller blind is as scandi as the trend that its so beautifully named after. Taking the pleasure of the small things, the playful birds carry heart shapes and are decorated in sweet tones. The simply stylised leaves and c so fresh and good-natured, the hygge birds nordic blue roller blind is as scandi as the trend that its so beautifully named after.

products.title: Nordic Blue
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition:polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
